explains: v. 打褶（pleat 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: Her hair was pleated in a queue.
sentences.cn: 她的头发编成了一条辫子。

sentences.en: As if its pleated thickets were the wide space.
sentences.cn: 密集的灌木丛就像广阔的宇宙。

sentences.en: Shobha was in her school uniform, a dark pleated skirt with a tucked-in white blouse, the first time I met her.
sentences.cn: 第一次和萨布哈见面时，她穿着校服——深色的褶裙和白色的带褶女衬衫。
